attributes.action: Make it Illegal to drive in any other lane of a public carrigeway other than the inside lane unless overtaking.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enforce this law to prevent lazy drivers sitting in middle or outside lanes of motorways and dual carrageways. This would reduce congestion on a massive scale but would also make drivers focus more on their actions whilst behind the wheel.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
